WhiteHawkClamav::ClamavEvtListener

WhiteHawkClamav::ClamavEvtListener Class Reference

This is an abstract class (interface) which defines de default event methods Note that all of this abstract methods will be called in a separate thread. More...

#include <ClamavEvtListener.hh>

List of all members.

Public Member Functions

virtual void onScan (ClamFile *file)=0
 This method is called for the Clamav-instance when a file is starting to be scanned.
virtual void onVirus (ClamFile *file)=0
 This method is called for the Clamav-instance when a virus is found.
virtual void onError (ClamFile *file, std::string errtype)=0
 This method is called when an error ocurrs.
virtual void onFinish ()=0
 This method is called when all files were scanned.

Detailed Description

This is an abstract class (interface) which defines de default event methods Note that all of this abstract methods will be called in a separate thread.
